Address.label: Address
Address.value: 10 SOUTH WACKER DRIVE,SUITE 2500, CHICAGO, Illinois, 60606, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: OFS Capital Corp is an externally managed, closed-end, non-diversified management investment company. Its business objective is to generate current income and capital appreciation by investing primarily in middle-market companies in the United States. The company focuses on investments in senior secured loans, including first lien, second lien, and unitranche loans, as well as subordinated loans and, to a lesser extent, warrants and other equity securities.
